Text:
Norway`s first Grindhouse production, bad actors, no plot,  violence and gore, Isabel Vibe. What`s not to like???

The plot is taken from Day of the Woman (I Spit on Your Grave) from 1978 http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0080503/ and La Casa Sperduta Nel Parco (The House on the Edge of the Park)  from 1980 http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0077713/

A must have for Grindhouse freaks!
